[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”Candles and Lighting” text_orientation=”center” button_one_text=”Contact Us” button_two_text=”Get A Quote” background_overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.61)” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” content_font_size=”20px” background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://partydecorhire.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Untitled-design.png” parallax=”on” background_blend=”overlay” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Candles offer an enchanting ambiance to any event, and at Party Décor Hire, we provide a cost-effective solution to elevate your atmosphere.
Crafted in-house from recycled materials, our candles not only contribute to the magical ambiance but also offer an economical choice compared to traditional options.
Choose from our selection of pillar candles, available in various heights and two widths: 7.5cm and 11cm. We also offer floating candles to add a unique touch to your decor.
Enhance the ambiance further with our exquisite tea-light votives and candlesticks, essential for creating a captivating atmosphere at your celebration.
Additionally, we offer fairy lights in lengths of 4 meters, 10 meters, and 20 meters.

 

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” module_alignment=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][lwp_image_carousel gallery_ids=”407,406,405,404,403,402,401,400,399,398,397,396,388,387,386″ slides_show=”4″ show_dots=”off” show_arrows=”off” autoplay_animation=”on” pause_on_hover=”off” infinite_animation=”on” vertical_layout=”off” adaptive_height=”off” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/lwp_image_carousel][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”10px||20px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” custom_margin=”|auto||auto|false|false” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Pillar Candles” image_icon_width=”200px” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”pillar-1″ image=”https://partydecorhire.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/pillar-1.jpg” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Our beloved pillar candles are available in various heights and two diameters: 7.5cm and 11cm. Whether used individually or grouped together, they add undeniable charm to any setting.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Ball Candles” image_icon_width=”200px” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”ballshaped-1″ image=”https://partydecorhire.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/ballshaped-1.jpg” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Introducing our stunning ball-shaped candles, available in three diameters: 7.5cm & 10cm. These elegant candles are perfect for adding a touch of sophistication to any event or space.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Floating Candles” image_icon_width=”200px” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”Floating-candles-1″ image=”https://partydecorhire.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Floating-candles-1.jpg” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Party Décor Hire make floating candles in two sizes. These are especially useful in centerpieces or to be used in groups around the venue.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” width=”100%” custom_margin=”|auto||auto|false|false” animation_style=”fade” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Candle Stands ” image_icon_width=”200px” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_font=”|||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”Candle-stands-1″ image=”https://partydecorhire.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Candle-stands-1.jpg” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Choose from glass cylinders perfectly sized for our candles, along with an intriguing assortment of floor and table stands, as well as candle bases (recommended for use on tablecloths), all customizable to match your preferred theme and style.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”PERSONALISED CANDLES” image_icon_width=”200px” _builder_version=”4.25.2″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#e878e8″ body_text_align=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” title_text=”personalised” image=”https://partydecorhire.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/personalised.jpg” sticky_enabled=”0″]

For a truly personalized touch to your celebration, we offer bespoke pillar or square candles that can be customized with details such as your name, function date, table numbers, or any other preference directly printed into the wax. Please note that these custom candles require advance ordering to ensure they are ready for your event.

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
